# Devices

Devices represent your laboratory instruments in LabDaemon. They provide thread-safe wrappers around your existing instrument code (VISA, PyVISA, PySerial, SDKs, etc.) and handle connection management, error handling, and synchronization.

Select a topic from the sidebar to read more:

- [Device Basics](device-basics.md) - Writing devices, lifecycle, and usage
- [Device Interfaces](device-interfaces.md) - Hardware abstraction and device-agnostic design
- [Basic Streaming](basic-streaming.md) - Essential streaming patterns and implementations
- [Advanced Streaming](advanced-streaming.md) - Complex streaming patterns and thread safety
